    count.addAggregate('COUNT');
    count.query();
    var recs = 0;
    if (count.next()) {
        recs = count.getAggregate('COUNT');
    }
    gs.infoMessage("Returned number of rows = " + recs);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-01-20 05:17:03</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9e85a238076c61104d58f16c7c1ed0bf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Test10086</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9e85a238076c61104d58f16c7c1ed0bf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-01-20 05:23:40</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9e85a238076c61104d58f16c7c1ed0bf"/></record_update>
